h5.style: display: inline-block; margin-left: 15px; color: white; vertical-align: middle;

div.style: z-index: 10001; padding:0; padding-top: 3px; height: 48px; line-height: 40px; position: fixed; background-image: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #2b2b2b; margin-bottom: 0px; background-color: #141414;

a.style: color: white; font-size: 1.4em; font-family: 'Encode Sans Condensed', sans-serif;

h4.style: text-align: center; font-weight: bold; margin: 0; padding: 0; margin-top: 5px; font-size: 18px;

h5.style: display: inline-block; margin-left: 15px; color: white; vertical-align: middle;

div.style: z-index: 10000; padding:0; padding-top: 3px; height: 50px; line-height: 40px; margin-bottom: 0px; background-color: black; position: relative;

form.style: display: inline-block; margin-left: 7px; width: calc(100% - 39px); position: relative;

input.name: nav-query
input.style: width: 100%; height: 36px; margin-top: 0px; vertical-align: middle; border-radius: 5px; background-color: #323231; border-color: #323231 !important; line-height: 35px; padding-left: 37px; font-size: 15px; padding-top: 4px

i.style: color: dimgray; position: absolute; top: 9px; left: 7px; font-size: 25px

button.style: color: white; font-size: 30px; display: inline-block; margin-right: 20px; background-color: transparent; outline: 0; border: 0;;

div.style: top:-12px; right: 1px; border-radius: 0px; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.1); width: 34px;

div.class: dropdown no-select search-nav-opacity hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl scrollable-search-type-button

button.style: outline:0; color:white; padding: 5px 11px 5px 12px; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.1); margin-top: -15px;

div.style: background-color: black; padding: 10px 10px 11px 10px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 8px; border: none;
color: white; display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; margin-right: 5px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;
color: #e5e5e5; display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; margin-right: 5px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;
color: #e5e5e5; display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; margin-right: 5px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;
color: #e5e5e5; display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; margin-right: 5px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;
color: #e5e5e5; display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;

p.style: color: gray; padding-bottom: 12px; font-size: 12px; padding-right: 60px; font-weight: normal;

div.p: 較多結果，較不精準。配對所有包含任何一個選擇的標籤的影片，而非全部標籤。

select.name: year
select.style: width: calc(50% - 5px); display: inline-block; float: left;

select.name: month
select.style: width: calc(50% - 5px); display: inline-block; float: right;
